body.name: Anidaroel Area Rug 4x6 Washable Living Room Rugs, Soft Boho Rug for Bedroom, Non Slip Stain Resistant Indoor Throw Carpet, Distressed Entryway Kitchen Rugs for Apartment Dining Room, Dark Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 10 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Soft & Comfortable】Our indoor accent rugs are machine-woven with finer fibers, providing an exceptionally soft and comforting touch compared to traditional area rugs. Whether you walk on it with bare feet or share it with your children or pets, revel in the warmth and coziness it offers.

【Non-Slip Design】Anidaroel area rug features a reliable anti-slip backing, effectively preventing slips and trips. This ensures a safer environment for your children and pets to play, while providing added security for elderly individuals in your home. Ideal for indoor high-traffic areas, providing peace of mind and safety for daily use.

【Ways to Deal with Creases】Simply lay the rug flat on the floor and walk around or place some heavy stuffs on them, creases will be gone in several days. Or lightly spray the creases and wrinkles with water in a spray bottle, lay the rug face down or hang it up in open air for a while, it will flatten out quickly.

【Washable & Easy to Clean】Discover the convenience of our washable printed rugs. Whether the rug requires a quick daily cleaning with a vacuum cleaner, broom, or damp rag to eliminate dust and dirt, or a deeper cleaning using an industrial washing machine or an outdoor hose rinse, maintaining its freshness is a breeze.

【Home Decor & Functional】Elevate your home with the anidaroel area rug, featuring floral print pattern and unique faded style to infuse artistic flair into your space. Whether placed in the back door, living room, dining room, kitchen, dorm, farmhouse, in front of the fireplace, kids' room, or bedrooms, this rug effortlessly complements your home decor.
body.description: Anidaroel Washable Area Rug for Living Room, Vintage Boho Rugs for Bedroom, Soft Stain Resistant Large Dining Room Table Mat, Non Slip Distressed Accent Floor Carpet for Bedside Office EntryDesigned to harmonize with your living space, this rug features a vintage boho design, adding a sophisticated yet eclectic touch. Its subtle yet captivating patterns are sure to complement your existing decor, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere.Features: boho rugs, washable rugs, dinning room rugs, entryway rugs, vintage rugs, living room rugs, playroom rugs, bedroom rugs, kitchen rugs, home office rugs, kids room rug.Exquisite Locking EdgeThe edge of the runner rug uses a edge wrapping design, which is not easy to loose. More durable and very beautiful.Non Slip TPE BackingThe non slip runner rug has anti-slip performance, which helps you rug stay in place.Sof t& Comfortable SurfaceThis Washable area rug's surface texture is low-profile design, which creates a comfortable surface for your feet to walk on.Note:Upon receiving your rug, you may notice some creases initially. Fear not! To quickly eliminate rug creases, you can use one of these steps:1. Roll the rug in the opposite direction of the creases and lay it flat for a while. Creases typically flatten out within 1-2 weeks of unrolling.2.Place heavy objects, such as books or furniture, along the creased areas. This helps to apply consistent pressure and encourages the rug to flatten.3.Simply lay the rug flat on the floor and walk around on it. Within a week, the creases will naturally disappear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, affordable, ultra soft rug
reviews.reviewText: I was on the hunt for an ultra soft rug, which I found from a local brick and mortar store but it was $200 and I couldn’t justify the cost. I ordered this on faith from the description and it was just as soft and velvety as the one I had found in town. It’s very thin and can be kind of slippery but for my purpose, it’s perfect. The green color is lush and lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered the gray 8x10 rug. It arrived boxed and folded into a giant cube. The pictures show what the rug looked like once we positioned it after opening. These pictures are a few minutes after we laid it on the floor. As you can see, the rug flattened out quickly upon opening.The rug is SOFT. Oh my gosh so soft!The rug is thin, it doesn't have a thick padding under it at all, so this rug isn't for comfort, purely for looks. Which, it is washable. Unfortunately, this will NOT fit in my washing machine as our washing machine has an agitator. I'll have to take it to a laundry mat when it's time to wash, and I'll try and update the review at that time.As the rug is thin and made for washing, vacuuming it is a bit of a challenge. We have 4 dogs and 3 of them shed. 1 is part Shepard and has a double coat so she sheds like it's her job.I was able to vacuum the rug with a lower setting on my vacuum. So just be aware of that when you purchase this rug.The rug is non-slip. We tried to drag it to reposition it and it was almost impossible to move it. So if you need a thin, washable, non-slip rug, this is for you!-Wife

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool Design, Plush, and Perfect Size
reviews.reviewText: So far, this rug is working out perfectly for my space. It's really soft and plush with a super cool design. The rug does not feel cheap at all and is washable. The other thing I love is that it is OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 certified. This means that this rug has been the tested against a huge list of over 1,000 chemicals that could pose risks to human health. In this case, I feel comfortable wearing bare feet on this rug. AAA++++!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Obsessed with the way this rug feels. I want to live barefoot on it all day. This rug is very thin but feels like silk on top. It's HUGE. Because it is very thin it can wrinkle easily if on carpet but has a sticky back designed to help it stick on top of tile. Beautiful design. The dark green is true to the picture and compliments our bedroom plants. Would get another in another color just because they feel so nice to lay on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super quick shipment. Well made from quality material. Looks awesome. Great size. Soft and comfortable on the feet. Good price. Good deal. Perfect for just about any room.
